Forester's pants

Forester's pants
Rarity:
Type: Loot
Slot: Legs
Value: 32
Search
Keyword: 		Woodcutting
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

These green pants are built to withstand scrapes and scratches from twigs and branches.

The Forester's pants item is a loot item.

Requirement

  • At least Woodcutting lvl. 22.

Attributes

+16% Work efficiency While doing Woodcutting.
+2% Chest finding While doing Woodcutting.
+10% Fine material finding While doing Woodcutting.

Uses

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Payment
Mysterious Merchant 10

Sources

Chest Drops

Chest Name Quantity Chance
(Per Roll) 		Chance
(Per Chest)† 		Odds
Woodcutting chest 1 1.250% 4.907% ~1 in 20

†Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Price
Mysterious Merchant 40
